Package it.polito.verifoo.rest.webservice

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BadGraphErrorMapper
    This class wrap the output of a BadGraphError to the user
    ErrorMapper
    This class wrap the output of an Error to the user
    InvalidXMLExceptionMapper
    This class wrap the output of an InvalidXMLException to the user
    RestExceptionMapper
    This class wrap the output of a Generic Exception to the user
    RestFoo
    This class implements the web service that deals with the deployment requests
    RestLog
    This class implements the web service that deals with the log request (present only for debugging purposes)
    RestMain
    This class is the root resources that will provide to the client the links for the other resources
    RestMeD
    This class implements the web service that deals with MeDICINE simulator
    RestTranslator
    This class implements the web service that deals with the converter requests
    WebApplicationExceptionMapper
    This class pass the output of a Web Application Exception to the user (in other case the exception will be catched from RestExceptionMapper).
    XMLProvider
    This class provide the validation of XML schema in input and in output for NFV object.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidXMLException
    This exception will be thrown by the web service if there is an error in the marshalling or the unmarshalling of a request
